channel.title: Grand Exchange 667
channel.description: I have it where u can buy items in the ge but it automatically sells it regaurdless if anyone has made an offer. I would much rather take that interface and make it into player owned shops, but I'm not sure how, or perhaps even fix the problem as to why it wont let me sell anything, but allows me to buy everything.

item.title: Grand Exchange 667
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

No, what he is saying is that you should explain your problem as accurate as possible. No one can help you when they don’t know what you want. You don’t need to provide any bit of code, though stating which source you’re might help in some cases.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Exchange 667
item.dc:creator: @suseto suseto
item.description:
@suseto wrote:

So basically, if you don’t know what the problem is don’t post here. Gotcha, makes sense except for the part about this being a help section. So if you know what the problem is why would you need help. Obviously, I don’t know where the problem is or I wouldn’t be asking for help. Help is requested not demanded remember that. Also, if you have nothing nice to say don’t say anything at all. I guess what your saying is unless you know the exact line or lines of code that are giving you the problem then don’t ask for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Exchange 667
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So. What do you want us to do here?

You didn’t really supply… anything.

Take a look at the section rules again. Specifically, rules 2 and 3.
